description: This task determines the available patches and updates from WSUS or Microsoft Update, which ever is configured.

module_source.description: The location, if required, of the source zip file for the PSWindowsUpdate Powershell Module.

module_url.description: The URL of the PSWindowsUpdate.zip file (including the file name) to be downloaded, e.g. 'https://fileserver/PSWindowsUpdate.zip'
